techmeme.title: Sources: Meta has explored a multibillion-euro investment in eyewear group EssilorLuxottica, which makes the Ray Ban-Meta glasses, to expand its partnership (Financial Times)

Analysis: the North Korea-linked WazirX hackers took 200 different assets, including $96.7M of Shiba Inu, $52.6M of Ether, $11M of Matic, and $7.6M of Pepe (Elliptic)
CCData: crypto coin listings on higher-volume exchanges like Binance and Coinbase are cumulatively up 11.6% to 2,066 in H1 2024, surpassing all of 2023 (Olga Kharif/Bloomberg)
German AI startup DeepL releases its new translation model with support for German, Japanese, and Simplified Chinese to and from English, available in DeepL Pro (Mike Wheatley/SiliconANGLE)
